definitions.title: pr. 1 S. I
definitions.body: (= Heb. [[אֲנִי]], q.v.: Zenj. Cilic. Eg. Aram. [[אנךְ]] (Cooke:182, 104, 208; S-C:oft), Nab [[נח]] . . . (Lzb:221); Targum [[אנא]], Syr. 0eno0);—I, Da 2:30, Da 4:6, Da 4:27, Da 5:16, before a ptcp. Da 3:25, Da 4:34, after a ptcp. (K:§ 76, 2b) Da 2:8 [[מִן־יַצִּיב יָדַע אֲנָה]], v:Da 2:23, Da 4:4; sq. a n.pr. Da 4:1 [[אֲנָה נבוכדנחר שְׁלֵח חֲוֵית]], v:Da 4:15, v:Da 4:34, Da 7:15, Ezr 6:12, Ezr 7:21, as nom. pendens, Da 4:31, Da 7:28; emphasizing a sf. (K:§ 87:3) Da 7:15, Ezr 7:21 (cf. S-C:B 8, J 12, K3. 5).
